ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1 ounce) package dry ranch dressing mix
2 (4 roll) packages Hawaiian buns, or as needed

cookingTips: Use Frank's RedHot or similar for classic buffalo flavor without overwhelming heat
Mix ranch seasoning directly with the hot sauce for even distribution
Shred chicken in the slow cooker to keep it moist and infused with sauce
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What toppings or sides would complement this spicy buffalo chicken?
